channel.title: Transformation on Modernization workshop
channel.description: Recent content in Transformation on Modernization workshop

item.title: Incident managment and response with Pagerduty
item.description: In this workshop, you will learn how Pagerduty helps with incident managment and response, and how to imporve your teams incident managment levraging AWS integration.

item.title: Transforming data in S3 with Redshift & dbt
item.description: In this workshop, you will learn how dbt, an open source transformation tool, empowers analysts to transform, test, and document their own SQL data pipelines using dataops best practices
